name: Color Night
analysis: The texture of the piece is too rough and varied to be AI.
description: Bright and colorful trees in a park, surrounding a park bench.

name: N/A
analysis: Certain patterns are repeated too perfectly, lacking the natural variation found in hand-painted works.
description: Bright yellow sunflowers painted in a pot

name: Magdalene with the Smoking Flame
analysis: There are small, less noticeable details, along with variations in the brushwork.
description: Picture of a woman sitting alone in the dark

name: N/A
analysis: While it may seem initially that the piece is quite complex and detailed, if you look closely at the individual elements, you can see how the same element is repeated over and over all over the piece.
description: Picture of a bouquet of flowers

name: N/A
analysis: This one is particularly difficult to classify, emulating East Asian landscape painting quite well. However, if we focus in on the leaves of the tree in the foreground, you will notice a smoothness to the texture and a lack of variation in the brushstrokes.
description: Picture of the bank of a lake covered by trees

name: a generic photograph
analysis: This image is also pretty difficult to classify, as the lack of proper lighting drowns out the details that you would usually look at to identify AI art. However, the emotion captured and how subtle yet anatomically correct the hands and facial features are are good clues that this is a real picture taken by a human
description: Picture of couple in dim moonlight

name: N/A
analysis: Thereâ€™s also something about the shadows and the wooden surface that may be a tipoff for some people. Pay special attention to how the noodles overlap and how repetitive each individual noodle looks, as well as how neatly organized they are on the plate
description: Picture of plate of spaghetti with tomato sauce
